data.title: Home
data.meta_description: Plan your visit to Discovery Place Science in Charlotte, NC. Explore interactive exhibits, engage in experiments, and ignite your curiosity.
data.text:
Military Appreciation Weekend

Visit Discovery Place Science during Labor Day Weekend, August 30 – September 2, and enjoy complimentary admission courtesy of USAA.

Get FREE admission for up to four guests. Only valid for active military personnel and USAA members.

Labs & Live Shows

Ignite a passion for learning at Discovery Place Science–Charlotte’s premier science museum–where live shows captivate young minds with thrilling experiments and awe-inspiring demonstrations.

As a top pick among things to do in Charlotte, you and your family can witness the wonders of chemistry, physics and biology unfold before your eyes, fostering a lifelong love of exploration and discovery.

Create unforgettable memories with your family at Discovery Place Science, where the magic of science comes to life and fuels their bright, curious minds in the heart of Charlotte.

Classes & Programs

Elevate your students’ educational experience at Discovery Place Science, Charlotte’s premier science museum, where engaging classes inspire young minds and enhance your curriculum. Bring the world of science to life with interactive sessions tailored to complement your lesson plans, making it a top destination for educators in Charlotte and beyond.

From robotics to chemistry and astronomy to biology, our diverse offerings cater to various interests, ensuring a genuinely enriching experience for every student.

By integrating these classes into your educational program, you will spark curiosity and foster a lifelong love of learning in your students. Discovery Place Science is committed to supporting educators by providing resources and immersive learning opportunities that align with state and national standards.
